section.title:
cash receipts
history of
customers
cash received from Cash Receipts by Customer
section.para: To view the history of Cash Receipts and their applications by Customer, select the "Cash Receipts by Customer" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: The display will include unposted as well as posted Cash Receipts which have an apply-to document. Unapplied Cash Receipts will not appear on this screen.

section.para: When viewing Cash Receipts by Customer, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Cash Receipt details for all Customers.
Select to display Cash Receipt details for a selected Customer.
Specify Customer Type whose Cash Receipt details you want to display.
Enter a Customer Type pattern to select a range of Customer Types. Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in .
Cash Receipts entered on and after this date will be displayed.
Cash Receipts entered on and before this date will be displayed.
Display lists Cash Receipt details, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
